instructions:
Gravy

 Simply add 1 BOU Gravy Cube to 1‚ÅÑ2 cup of boiling water in pan 2. Whisk over high heat for about 2 minutes

Sandwich

Slice the croissant lengthwise, almost all the way through 2. Layer the turkey, BOU gravy, cranberry sauce, stuffing, and a few spinach leaves.

If desired, wrap the sandwich in foil and warm in the oven for 5-7 minutes at 300 degrees.
